project_context.target_market: India - Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities, focusing on Tamil, Telugu, and Kannada speakers
project_context.primary_users: Users aged 18-35 seeking companionship, friendship, dating, and content creators seeking income
key_differentiators: Higher creator revenue share (75-85% vs 50-60% competitors)
AI companion + Real creators hybrid model
Fast payout (T+1 vs T+3 to T+7)

terminology.active_user: User who performs at least one engagement action (call, gift, room participation) within measurement period
terminology.creator: User who provides entertainment/companionship services and earns through calls, gifts, and virtual items
terminology.coin: Virtual currency purchased by users to spend on platform features (calls, gifts, etc.)
terminology.GMV: Gross Merchandise Value - total transaction value before any deductions
terminology.T+1: Transaction settlement on next business day
terminology.live_room: Audio-only group chat space where multiple users can join and interact

user_preferences.priority_focus: MVP features first, then scaling features
